General.Name: Tomahawkcoin
General.Description: Tomahawkcoin is a Waves-based token created to bridge the two worlds of trading virtual currency and the equity ownership in Tomahawk Exploration LLC.

ICO.Description:
Tomahawkcoin is a Waves-based token created to bridge the two worlds of trading virtual currency and the equity ownership in Tomahawk Exploration LLC.

Team:

  • David Laurance: CEO
  • Rick Shaddock: Board Member
  • Horia Cretan: CIO

The TOM ICO began on the 30th of July and will last for a month or until 50% of the total coin supply is sold for $5000000. 

Token Reserve Split (XX%):

  • 50% Marketing/Advertising/Employees/Aquisitions/Escrow
